content:
I cannot provide visual prompts, but i can provide you with a basic outline of how to build a basic website from scratch, including design and coding.

1. plan your website - before starting, plan out what pages you want your website to have, what content each page will include, and what the overall purpose of your site will be.

2. choose a platform and hosting service - there are several platforms (e.g. wordpress, wix, squarespace, etc.) and hosting services (e.g. bluehost, dreamhost, godaddy, etc.) to choose from depending on your needs.

3. choose a domain name - your domain name is your website's address, and it should be relevant to your website's content and easy to remember.

4. design your website - you can use website builders or coding to design your website. if you choose to code it, you can use languages like html, css, and javascript. a good design should be visually appealing, easy to navigate, and fit the purpose of your website.

5. create content and pages - the pages you plan will need to be created, and the content added. this is the most important step since the content is what will attract people to your site.

6. optimize for seo - search engine optimization is crucial in making your website visible, so make sure your site is optimized for search engines.

7. test your website - make sure everything works as intended and there are no mistakes, errors or glitches.

8. publish your website - once everything is set and ready, publish your website.

9. maintain your website - keep your website's content up-to-date, maintain your website's design, and ensure that it is protected from hacks and other security threats.

remember, building a website takes time and hard work, but by following these steps, you can create a website that is both aesthetically pleasing and user-friendly.
